name: Girls Tank Battle
overview: A tank shot that blows everything away with delightfully! Each stage equipped with a hot skill! Beat the boss and enjoy the cute girls! The survival of girls who have fallen into a four-dimensional world begins. When you clear the stage, you select one of the three skills to challenge the next stage with your own strategy. ・ A tank battle that relieves stress with explosive direction begins. ・ Collect dozens of different weapons, skills, and unique tanks. ・ Gallery mode is waiting for you to appreciate a cute girl depending on your skills. ・ It appears a thrilling bonus game mode for additional goods. ・ It is possible to manipulate games that can be easily played by men and women of all ages. ・ It is a battle system that adds skills with your own strategy when you clear the stage. ・ The boss battle that makes your hands sweat increases tension and sense of achievement. ・ Get goods in challenge mode and upgrade to your own tank in technical research mode. ・ Gather the tanks you want, and enjoy the sub-tank system where you can take up to three to fight together. ・ The illustrations of attractive tank battle girls by cartoonist OGATA TEI make your eyes more pleasant. The exciting new-sense tank shooting game with simple manipulation! You can collect new military costumes of cute girls every five stages. Defeat the final boss and enjoy the images of all the girls in gallery mode.
